what about the security of my data when: we keep your data private and end to end encrypted with multiple security checks in our specialised directories. Data leaks are impossible.
what if the file size exceeds 10mb: you can try compressing the file as much as possible or make multiple submissions from the same form and mentioning it in the description.
what if we want to submit multiple submi: you can do so. Our software recognizes multiple submissions from the same user as completely distinct with no relation to the other.
